item.title: Forecaster.ini...or possibly outie?
item.description: Even though I have a baby at home who loves a good belly laugh, I wanted to share a helpful tip about Forecaster 7.0. Installing the Forecaster 7.0 client is straightforward, only requiring a few clicks to finish. After that, applying the service pack gets you up and running quickly. Let’s say you need to connect to existing Forecaster databases. You start the Forecaster client, but only the Demo database appears in the company list.
